text: Thousands of years and many civilizations have defined a marriage as the union between one man and one woman. With few exceptions, those civilizations that did not follow that perished.
author: Randy Neugebauer

text: Forty-five States, as the gentleman just said, have determined by people that were elected by the people of that State that marriage is the definition of one man and one woman.
author: Randy Neugebauer

text: I figure no matter how old you are, it's always going to be your first marriage and no life experience is going to make you a better judge of who you should marry.
author: Utada Hikaru

text: Either marriage is a destiny, I believe, or there is no sense in it at all, it's a piece of humbug.
author: Max Frisch

text: Gay marriage has jumped out of the closet on to the front page. Everyone from the president of the U.S. to retired four-star general Colin Powell is embracing the issue, now supported by most Americans. Still, a few people, like former First Lady Laura Bush appear to be conflicted.
author: Kitty Kelley
